query.statement:
SELECT PAPRYYYYMM,TEMNM, ZZACTSS, LIFNR, LIFNRNM, TEMNO, NAMET2 , ITEM_CNT1 , ITEM_CNT2 , ITEM_CNT3 , CASE WHEN TOT IS NULL THEN 10 ELSE TOT END AS TOT , ITEM_CNT1_SUM , ITEM_CNT2_SUM , ITEM_CNT3_SUM , TOT_SUM , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CASE WHEN TOT_SUM > 0 THEN TOT_SUM ELSE 10 END desc) AS RANKING FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, LIFNRNM ,TEMNM, ZZACTSS, TEMNO, NAMET2 , ITEM_CNT1 , ITEM_CNT2 , ITEM_CNT3 , TOT , ITEM_CNT1_SUM , ITEM_CNT2_SUM , ITEM_CNT3_SUM
, CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - dec(( dec(ITEM_CNT1_SUM,10,1) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE))+( dec(ITEM_CNT2_SUM,10,1)* CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE))+( dec(ITEM_CNT3_SUM,10,1) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE)),10,1) AS TOT_SUM FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, LIFNRNM , TEMNM, ZZACTSS, TEMNO, NAMET2 , ITEM_CNT1 , ITEM_CNT2 , ITEM_CNT3 , TOT , SUM(ITEM_CNT1) OVER (PARTITION BY LIFNR, TEMNO ORDER BY LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS ITEM_CNT1_SUM , SUM(ITEM_CNT2) OVER (PARTITION BY LIFNR, TEMNO ORDER BY LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS ITEM_CNT2_SUM , SUM(ITEM_CNT3) OVER (PARTITION BY LIFNR, TEMNO ORDER BY LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS ITEM_CNT3_SUM FROM ( SELECT E.PAPRYYYYMM, E.LIFNR , C.NAME1 AS LIFNRNM , E.TEMNO , L.TEAM_NM AS TEMNM , L.ZZACTSS_NM AS ZZACTSS , J.NAMET AS NAMET2 , CASE WHEN E.ITEM_CNT1 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE E.ITEM_CNT1 END AS ITEM_CNT1 , CASE WHEN E.ITEM_CNT2 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE E.ITEM_CNT2 END AS ITEM_CNT2 , CASE WHEN E.ITEM_CNT3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE E.ITEM_CNT3 END AS ITEM_CNT3 , CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - dec(( dec(E.ITEM_CNT1,10,1) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE))+( dec(E.ITEM_CNT2,10,1)* CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE))+( dec(E.ITEM_CNT3,10,1) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE)),10,1) AS TOT
FROM ( SELECT MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , SUM(ITEM_CNT1) AS ITEM_CNT1 , SUM(ITEM_CNT2) AS ITEM_CNT2 , SUM(ITEM_CNT3) AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT , SUBSTR(A.OCURDATE,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM , A.LIFNR --업체번호 , A.TEMNO , (CASE WHEN A.ITEM = 'A' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END) AS ITEM_CNT1 , (CASE WHEN A.ITEM = 'C' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END) AS ITEM_CNT2 , (CASE WHEN A.ITEM = 'D' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END) AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0154 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 M02 ON M02.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M02.POSID = A.PSPID AND M02.POSID_1 = A.POSID WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ( A.TEMNO != ' ') AND (substr(A.OCURDATE,1,6) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT#)
AND A.TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND M02.ZZGUBUN = #CHK_GBN#
GROUP BY A.MANDT, SUBSTR(A.OCURDATE,1,6), A.LIFNR, A.TEMNO, A.PSPID, A.POSID, A.ITEM
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, SUBSTR(#YYYYMMDD0#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD1#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD2#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD3#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD4#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD5#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD6#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD7#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD8#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD9#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD10#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD11#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS ITEM_CNT1 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT2 , 0 AS ITEM_CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
-- ) GROUP BY MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO ) GROUP BY MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS E INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON E.MANDT = C.MANDT AND E.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 KK ON E.MANDT = KK.MANDT AND E.LIFNR = KK.LIFNR AND E.TEMNO = KK.TEMNO AND KK.DELEF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 W ON E.MANDT = W.MANDT AND E.LIFNR = W.LIFNR INNER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT , DTEXT3 AS TEAM_CD , DTEXT4 AS TEAM_NM , CODE2 AS ZZACTSS_CD , CTEXT2 AS ZZACTSS_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE N WHERE N.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND N.DTEXT3 <> '' AND N.LANG = 'ko' ) L ON W.MANDT = L.MANDT AND W.ZZACTSS = L.ZZACTSS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, POSIT, NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSIT = 'X' AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' -- AND RETIF <> 'X' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, POSIT, NAMET ) AS J ON J.MANDT = E.MANDT AND J.LIFNR = E.LIFNR AND J.TEMNO = E.TEMNO WHERE E.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (W.ZZACTSS IS NOT NULL OR W.ZZACTSS != '' OR W.ZZACTSS != ' ') AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND E.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND (C.ES_INDC = 'X' OR (C.ES_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND E.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
-- AND (E.TEMNO IS NOT NULL AND E.TEMNO != '' AND E.TEMNO != ' ')
AND W.ZZACTSS IN ( SELECT CODE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = E.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = 'ko' AND DTEXT3 = #TEMNO# )
AND W.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
))) --WHERE (NAMET2 IS NOT NULL OR NAMET2 != '' OR NAMET2 != ' ') FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
